thread.title: Who is appearing on Just Tattoo Of Us? Meet the celebs brave enough to get "bespoke and bizarre" inkings on TV
thread.title_full: Who is appearing on Just Tattoo Of Us? Meet the celebs brave enough to get "bespoke and bizarre" inkings on TV

author: Vicki Newman
title: Who is appearing on Just Tattoo Of Us? Meet the celebs brave enough to get "bespoke and bizarre" inkings on TV
text:
Who is appearing on Just Tattoo Of Us? Meet the celebs brave enough to get "bespoke and bizarre" inkings on TV The show is being hosted by Stephen Bear and Charlotte Crosby Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Has Bear got a tattoo of Charlotte Crosby on his arm? Share this video Get celebs updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
A host of celebrity couples are braving the pain to get some of the most "bizarre" tattoos ever seen on TV. 
Just Tattoo Of Us will see pairs of friends, family members, couples, and celebs put to the test by designing tattoos for each other. 
The catch is that the person being tattooed doesn't know what it is until after it's finished and etched on their skin forever. 
MTV's latest show, hosted by Stephen Bear and Charlotte Crosby , sees couples given some of the "dodgiest, funniest and most shocking tattoos seen on TV". Read More Charlotte Crosby And Stephen Bear will be getting tattooed as well (Photo: MTV) The pair host the show together (Photo: MTV) 
Each week, three couples will be put through a test of trust as they design bespoke tattoos from declarations of love to the downright bizarre, resulting in some of the most jaw-dropping reactions on TV. 
So who is brave enough to be tattooed? 
Episode one will see Charlotte welcome her best pal, Geordie Shore star Sophie Kasaei and her boyfriend Joel Corry. Sophie and Joel will be designing tattoos for each other (Photo: Splash News) Does Holly really get Kyle's face tattooed on her neck? (Photo: HollyGshore/Instagram) Chloe and Ashley will have permanent reminders of each other (Photo: FameFlynet) 
Also joining the series is Geordie royalty Holly Hagan, Kyle Christie and Nathan Henry, and Ex on the Beach favourites Sean Pratt, Jess Impiazzi, and Ashley Cain with girlfriend Chloe Khan . 
The Valleys sweetheart Lateysha Grace will also receive an inking, as will Union J heartthrob Jaymi Hensley. 
Charlotte and Bear will also be climbing into the chair and testing each other’s new found trust. They don’t have an ink-ling what they’ve let themselves in for! 
* Just Tattoo Of Us premieres Monday 3rd April at 10pm, only on MTV Like us on Facebook
